Saying his "heart was in Indiana," Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.

Sergio Marchionne said both companies going forward would continue to pursue strategic alliances, saying that the market was changing "at the speed of light." He cited Fiat's Chrysler stake as an example. I think our presence in Chrysler could not have been forecast, and certainly in hindsight it was probably one of the best things that could have happened to Fiat. I think it is also one of the best things that could have happened to Chrysler too. Sergio Marchionne already has a lot on his plate this year. The redesigned 2011 Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan have been driving off the assembly line for several weeks, and the vehicles are selling well, Sergio Marchionne has said. I think whenever we launch new products coming out of these plants, we need to be there, said Sergio Marchionne last Wednesday during the North American International Auto Show in Detroit. "I think it's an important recognition of the effort that's gone in here by our colleagues on the shop floor."

a miracle as she watched U.S. Rep. Gabrielle Giffords open her eyes for the first time after being shot over the weekend. "It felt like we were watching a miracle," said U.S. Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz . The strength that you could see flowing out of her, it was like she was trying to will her eyes open. Debbie Wasserman Schultz , who's from Weston, was in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room with Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-NY.
